Text:
Bad in that the audio is so low even with 400% noise amplification in ffdshow audio decoder it still has a lot of noise and even using a noise filter it just makes the audio harder to hear. 

Other releases have even worse audio then this when it sounds like the whole movie was recorded in an echo chamber, lots of background noise, and even with ampflication it's still very hard to make out all the audio.
Video quality is great for a theater rip but audio is muddy and voices are hard to pick out.
